name: Sacred Truths
description:
A Hic et Nunc genesis poem by Artemis Wylde

Sacred Truths is a rich-media spoken word poem about the energetic door that exists between our heart and our throat (and thus, our voice). Noticing when we've allowed the door to close and working towards reopening it, time and time again, is an ever-present, never ending practice in self-liberation.
